featured_events.title: African Union Kwame Nkrumah Awards for Scientific Excellence
Challenge Campus 2030 – Edition 2: Imagine the sustainable university of the future!
featured_events.content:
Challenge Campus 2030 – Edition 2: Imagine the sustainable university of the future!
November 3, 2020
Announcements
,
Featured Articles
224 Views
Imagine….
«
It’s September 2030 and the Agenda for the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) has ended. Students over the world are returning to their Campuses, which are now finally sustainable.
»
University campuses are at the heart of the change: in 10 years, they should have achieved the 17 SDGs to be able to welcome and educate the next generation! What will these Campuses be like?
Imagine a solution that will allow these sites to be considered socially, economically and environmentally sustainable.
For More Informations :
